thread.title: SEO PowerSuite Named Finalist for US Search Awards in the Best SEO Software Category
thread.title_full: SEO PowerSuite Named Finalist for US Search Awards in the Best SEO Software Category

author: Aleh Barysevich
title: SEO PowerSuite Named Finalist for US Search Awards in the Best SEO Software Category
text:
Link-Assistant.Com , the innovative software house and the company behind a range of popular internet marketing products, announced this morning that their flagship product, SEO PowerSuite, has been named finalist for the US Search Awards 2015 in the category Best SEO Software. Along with SEO PowerSuite, there are seven more nominees for the title of the Best SEO Software 2015, with the winner to be announced next month during Pubcon Las Vegas. "US Search Awards is a recognized ceremony that celebrates most distinguished professionals and companies in the search industry, so we're both proud and humbled to have been shortlisted for the award. I'd like to thank the panel of judges for having noticed merit in our award application and the work we do on a daily basis to develop a stand-out SEO software product. I'd also like to congratulate all the other shortlisted finalists," says Aleh Barysevich, Chief Marketing Officer and Co-Founder, Link-Assistant.Com / SEO PowerSuite.
"Held for the third time this year, US Search Awards has become an integral part of Pubcon Las Vegas event, and our team is excited to be part of it this year," continues Aleh.
More information about US Search Awards can be found at http://www.ussearchawards.com .
Below are some highlights from SEO PowerSuite's US Search Award application:
1. SEO PowerSuite is a profitable self-financing project.
2. The software combines top-notch functionality with minimized costs, making full-scale SEO affordable for businesses of any size.
3. Desktop nature coupled with advanced technology gives users advantage no SaaS solution can offer.
4. In the past 12 months, SEO PowerSuite has been updated every week or two with features to match the new search trends.
5. This year alone, SEO PowerSuite has been downloaded by 106,440 users in the USA and internationally.
6. With its unequaled functionality, affordable price, and non-stop development, SEO PowerSuite is a unique price-to-value offer on the SEO software market.
SEO PowerSuite's detailed description and the free download are available at http://www.link-assistant.com .
About Link-Assistant.Com and SEO PowerSuite
Link-Assistant.Com is the maker of SEO PowerSuite - the all-in-one SEO software for search marketers, digital agencies and bloggers. SEO PowerSuite is a toolset made up of 4 individual tools – Rank Tracker, WebSite Auditor, SEO SpyGlass and LinkAssistant – delivering best results when combined. Link-Assistant.Com is a small and dedicated company that competes on software excellence and customer service. The company embraces the changing role of SEO in today's digital marketing world and believes that brands will keep relying on accurate SEO data to succeed online.
